translation: Ae pyghmbri khda, tvhụ̄ khvcziv ḥẓ khdays byyhi mah khvcziv kạnshi, kạfrn yim nnụ̄ pạtthụ̄ dyns khlaf chhi byyhi mnafqn yim kạfrn sintụ̄ mtfq chhi, tihindis vnns mah ḥẓ kriv aʿtbar, tihnz kthh mah ḥẓ mạniv. Be shk Allah tʿālyā chhu svrue zanh vun pvur ḥkmt vvl, tihindụ̄ sạry ḥkm chhi fạydh sintụ̄ brith.

Tvhụ̄ pkiv tamy ḥkmh mvjvb yus tohyhi kun vḥy svznh yivan chhu tuhndis prvrdgar sndi ṭrfh, ae lvukv pzipạtthụ̄ Allah tʿālyā chhu pvur zanan thi svrue yhi tvhụ̄ kran chhiv. Tohyhi andrh yus akhah sạnis pyghmbr snz mkhalft kri tmis sintụ̄ anzravav asụ̄ pane.

Byyhi kriv tvkl khdays petth, ps chhu Allah tʿālyā tuhnz kạm pvur krvun, aath mqablh hykhi nh chlith timn lvukn hund kanhh tdbyr. Mngth nychuv ḥqyqy nychuv zanun, tvpth tmụ̄ snzi ṭlaq dinh āmcziznanhi sintụ̄ nythr krns petth ṭʿnh zny krnụ̄ avs tiyuthue chyzah mshhvr, yithh pạtthụ̄ pnnhi āshnhi mvj vanun ya majhi sintụ̄ tshbyh dins petth nkaḥ czhynan avs khyal krnh yivan, ya hrgah kanhh shkhṣah avs setthah hushyar th ʿqlmnd āsan, dapan ạsụ̄ amis chhi zh dil syns mnz, yimn tryshvunụ̄ kthn hund aṣlaḥ kvr Allah tʿālyā hn, frmvvun.

Vaqʿs mnz krụ̄ nh Allah tʿālyā hn kạnshi hndis syns mnz zh dil pạd, yithe pạtthụ̄ frmvvun, byyhi kri nh Allah tʿālyā hn tihnzh znanh yimn sintụ̄ tvhụ̄ ẓihar chhiv kran yʿny pnnyn mḥrmatn sintụ̄ chhvukh tshbyhh divan, timh chhanh spdan thi krnh sintụ̄ tuhnz majhi. Yithe pạtthụ̄ krụ̄ nh Allah tʿālyā hn tuhndụ̄ mngth nychivụ̄ ḥqyqtaan tuhndy nychivụ̄. Yimh kthh tuhnz chhe ṣrf tuhndyv chanttyv vannh yivan yimn nh vaqʿs sintụ̄ kanhh mshabht chhe blkh chhu ghlṭ kthh chhunh kanhh vaqʿī amrah spdan. Lhādha mngth nychivụ̄ snzi ṭlaq dinh āmczi znanhi sintụ̄ nkaḥ krns petth ṭʿn v tshnyʿ krun chhu mḥẓ jhl. Allah tʿālyā chhu pzkth frmavan, sue chhu syz vath havan. Chnanchh yimn tryn ghlṭyn hund aṣlaḥ kvr Allah tʿālyā hn, yylhi nh tim vaqʿs mnz tuhndụ̄ nychivụ̄ chhi, bs mah ạsiv tvhụ̄ ts mngth mạlụ̄ sund nychuv vnan.

Mngth nychvyn ạsiv tvhụ̄ nad divan pnnyn ḥqyqy malyn kun nsbt krith, soe chhu zyadh anṣafch kth khdays nishhi, hrgah ne tohyhi mʿlvm āsn tihindụ̄ mạlụ̄ tylhi ge tim tuhndụ̄ dyny bạe ạsithe byyhi ge tim tuhndụ̄ dvst th rfyq. Tmy mnasbth ạsiv kanhh mnạsb lfẓah astʿmal krith timn ālv divan. Tohyhi chhunh kanhh qṣvr hrgah tvhụ̄ aath mnz kunhi vqth vshfh gczihh, hrgah tvhụ̄ zạnith krith ʿmdaan v qṣdaan yuth chyz kriv tylhi chhu gnah, hrgah tamhi gnah nishhi tvbh th astghfar kriv, tth kryv Allah tʿālyā mghfrt kyazi Allah tʿālyā chhu setthah mghfrt krvun setthah rḥm krvun.

Pyghmbri brḥq chhu zyadh tʿlq thavan baaymann sintụ̄ tihindyv panv khoth, kyazi shkhṣh sund pan agr ychh āshi tylhi chhu ẓạhre suh chhu bdkhvah amụ̄ sund. Ḥẓrt nby krym ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slm tim chhi khạrkhvah baaymann hndi khạṭr hmyshh rut yczhan. Hrgah shkhṣh spnd pan jane āshi tvthi ma chhe tmis khbr sarine chyzn hnz kth kth mnz chhu tmis nfʿ th fạydh. Ḥẓrt nby krym timn chhu Allah tʿālyā hn sarine mfyd th nafʿ chyzn hund ʿlm ʿṭa kvrmut. Bhrḥal tihindi ṭrfh chhu nfʿe nfʿ, lhādha chhu tihund ḥq panh khothi thi zyade, tmy mokhh gczhn time zyadh ttạtthụ̄ āsnụ̄ qbylh kranhi khoth, mạlis majhi hndi khoth blkh pnnhi panh khoth thi. Tihnz azvaji ṭahrat chhe baaymann hnz vạldh. Ḥẓrt nby krym ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slm tuhndụ̄ mʿnvy babh ṣạb āsun chhu lạzm kh tihnz azvaj ṭahrat gczhn āsnhi baaymann hnzmʿnvy vạldh vjvbi tʿẓyms andr, byyhi chhi baaymann hndụ̄ qryby rshth dar addụ̄ aaddyn zyadh ḥqdar vrathts andr, khdae snzi ktabhi andr yʿny tihindi shrʿī ḥkmh mvjvb, baaymanv khoth byyhi mhajrv khoth, mgr he tvhụ̄ pnnyn dvstn nsbt kanhh aḥsanah kriv tth chhunh kanhh ḥrj yʿny bkhshạyshhi pạtthụ̄ ya vṣyt pạtthụ̄ diyiv kynhh chyzah timn. Yohe ḥkm chhu lvḥ mḥfvẓs andr lykhnh āmut yʿny vratht chhe rshth darne andr jạry krnụ̄.

Byyhi chhu suh vqt qạbl dhkr yylhi aashi rvtt ʿhd pyghmbrn nishhi khaṣ krith tohyhi nishhi yarsvl Allah ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slm, byyhi nvḥ ʿlyh alslamn nishhi, byyhi abrahym ʿlyh alslams, byyhi mvsyā ʿlyh alslams, byyhi ʿīsyā ʿlyh alslams yus mrym ʿlyha alslam sund frznd chhu, yath kthhi petth kh bndgy kriv khdae snz, byyhi diyiv lvukn thi nad tihinzy bndgy th ʿbadts kun, yohe ʿhd rvtt ashi timn nishhi mẓbvṭ ʿhdah.

Yth Allah tʿālyā tḥqyqat kri qyamt kh doh pziyryn nishhi yʿny pyghmbrn nishhi tihindi pziyuk yymhi sintụ̄ tihund shrf ẓạhr spdi byyhi spdi ḥjt th dlyl qạym mnkrn petth. Aamy andrh sapud thạbt ṣaḥbi vḥy yas petth chhu vạjb vḥy ys atbaʿ krun. Ṣaḥbi vḥy ys vrạe yim chhi timn petth chhu vạjb ṣaḥb vḥy sund atbaʿ th pạrvy krnụ̄, byyhi chhu Allah tʿālyā hn kạfrn th mnkrn khạṭr tyar thvvmut dg th dvd tulh vun ʿdhab, aamhi pth chhu Allah tʿālyā frmavan aakh vaqʿāh suh gvv yohe kh ḥẓrt nby krym ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slm timav krụ̄ qbylh bny nẓyrkụ̄ yhvudụ̄ mdynh shryf nishhi jila vṭn, timn sapud ḥkm mdynh shryf mnz nyrnuk, tvpth sombrạvụ̄ timav ʿrbkụ̄ mkhtlf qbylh qryb dah bah sas lvukh mdynh shryfs petth ḥmlh krnh khạṭr. Nby krym ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmv kvr ḥkm kh mdynh shryfs andụ̄ andụ̄ khniv khndq, yimn hndis khnss andr bnfsi nfys timav panh thi kạm kr, mycz sạrkh, kbnhi phuttravykh, akis ryts tanụ̄ rvudụ̄ tim mdynh shryfs mḥaṣrh krith. Tth mnz ạs kunhi kunhi jayhi dvuri dvuri lrrạe thi spdan, balākhr kr Allah tʿālyā hn mslmann yạry, ẓạhrpạtthụ̄ sapud aakh tyz hva yymụ̄ kạfrn hndụ̄ khymh dạrith dith, khymn hnz raz czachn, bạṭn pạtthụ̄ svuzn mlạykn hnz lshkr yimav kạfrn chhalh chhangr kr, tim pvush nh czalns, timav khyvv balkl shkst, yath jngs chhi vnan jngi aḥzab, tkyazi mkhtlf qbylh ạsụ̄ āmtụ̄ jng krnhi, byyhi chhis vnan jngi khndq tkyazi bmshvrh slman farsy āe bḥkmi ḥẓrt nby nby krym ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slm mdynh shryfs andụ̄ andụ̄ khndq khnnh. Aamhi jngh nishhi fargh sapdith spdụ̄ nby krym ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slm yhvudn hndis qbyls nby quryẓs sintụ̄ jng krns kun mtvjh, kyazi timav avs khladi mʿāhdh bny nẓyrn mdynh shryfs mḥaṣrh krns andr mdd kvrmut.

Ae baaymanv, czyts pạviv Allah tʿālyā snz so nʿmt yosh tmụ̄ tohyhi ʿṭa kr yymhi saʿth tohyhi petth dshmnn hndụ̄ varyah fvj āe ḥmlh krnh khạṭr. Ps svuz aashi timn petth tyz vav byyhi suh fvj mlạykn hund yus nh tohyhi bvznh avs yivan. Allah tʿālyā avs tuhndụ̄ tim sạry tdbyr vuchhan yim tvhụ̄ tamhi saʿth kran ạsiv khndq khnn hyv byh thạbt th mẓbvṭ rvzn kafrn hndi mqablh khạṭrh, thi vuchhith avs Allah tʿālyā khosh gczhan, tohyhi petth rạẓụ̄ spdan th tohyhi mddkran, yhi vqʿh sapud tamhi saʿth.

Dshmn āe tohyhi petth ḥmlh krnhi tohyhi petthụ̄ kinụ̄ thi yʿny mạdan kh hyrmhi ṭrfh, tohyhi bvnụ̄ kinụ̄ thi, byyhi yylhi khvfh sbbh tuhnzh achh drh ljhi dshmnn kun, byyhi āsv vạnjhi vaczmaczh hiryn petth, byyhi ạsiv tvhụ̄ khdays mtʿlq ʿjyb ʿjyb mkhtlf khyal kran.
Aamy vqth āyhi āzmạys krnh baaymann, byyhi āe tim dnh vnh setthah.
Byyhi yymhi saʿth vannhi lgụ̄ mnafq, byyhi yimn lvukn hndyn diln mnz nfaqch th shkch bymạrụ̄ ạs, aashi sintụ̄ yus vʿdh khdayn th tihindụ̄ pyghmbrn kvrmut avs, suh avs nh mgr dvkhh th fryb.

Byyhi yylhi tihnze aakh mnafqn hnz jmaʿt vannhi lj, ae mdynh kyv lvukv, tohyhi hyvkvunh dshmn sund mqablh krith, lhādha phiyiriv pvt gczihv panun gr vaps. Byyhi hyvk akụ̄ jmaʿtn timav andrh nby kryms ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slm vapsy hund ajazt mngun. Tim ạsụ̄ dapan be shk sạnụ̄ gr chhi ghạrmḥfvẓ ḥalankh tim ghạr mḥfvẓ ạsụ̄ nh mgr tim ạsụ̄ yczhan aamy bhanh czalun.

Hrgah tim shhrs mnz ạsith shhrh kyv ṭrfv kinụ̄ kanhh ghnyma dshmnah votlith yiyhi ha, tvpth yiyhi ha czhanddnhi timn nishhi ftnh th fsad aslams khlaf brpa krun, ẓrvr spdhn tim gr bar trạvith tth ftns sintụ̄ shạml, tvpth krhn nh tth mnz mgr kmy tạr yʿny ghrn mnz rvzhn nh zyadh kals.
Ḥalankh yimav lvukv avs ʿhd kvrmut aamhi brvntth khdays sintụ̄ kh tim āsn nh pvt phyirith czlan, khdays sintụ̄ yus ʿhd krnh āmut āshi tmuyk yiyhi ẓrvr baz purs krnh.

Tvhụ̄ frmạviyvukh yarsvl Allah, hrgz diyhi nh tohyhi kanhh fạydh czalun, hrgah tvhụ̄ czliv mrnh nishhi ya qtlh nishhi, hrgah czliv thi tvthi tuliv nh tvhụ̄ zndgy hund fạydh mgr km se kals, kyazi ạkhr chhuv marnue.

Frmạviyvukh tvhụ̄ yarsvl Allah, ae lvukv kus aakhah hykhi tohyhi bchạvith khdays nishhi, hrgah suh tuhndi khạṭr yyczihh kanhh skhty ya kus aakhah hykhi tohyhi skhty vatnạvith hrgah khdae sund airadh āshi tohyhi nsbt kunhi mhrbạny hund. Lbn nh tim pnnhi khạṭr khdays vrạe kạnshi dvsts nh kạnshi mddgars.

Allah tʿālyā chhu tohyhi mnz timn mnafqn pvur zanan yim byyan lvukn chhi jhads mnz shạml spdnh nishhi pth rttan, byyhi yim pnnyn bayn vanan chhi aashi nishhi yiyiv, jhads mah spdiv shạml. Tim chhi tithụ̄ buzdl kh panh thi chhinh lrrayhi mnz shạml spdan mgr kme, tth mnz thi chhakh nh āsan nyt ṣaf.

Bkhyl chhi tim tuhndi ḥqh, timhi shmvlyt andrh chhu tihund ghrẓ yhi āsan kh mslamnn gvczh nh pvur ḥṣh mali ghnymtuk tarun. Asụ̄ thi rvzv blụ̄ brae nam shạml yuth asụ̄ thi ptv lakhi mali ghnymt kh ḥṣkụ̄ ḥqdar bnav. Adh yylhi khvfuk vqt vatan chhu, timhi saʿth chhvukh tvhụ̄ vuchhan tim tohyhi kun aarzman pạtthụ̄ nẓrh divan, achh tihinz chhe nczan āsan ts shkhṣh sndụ̄ pạtthụ̄ yas mrnnụ̄ czhtth phyirmcz āshi. Adh yylhi khvf th khṭrh czlan chhu tamhi saʿth chhi tim tohyhi tyz zyvi sintụ̄ aiydha divan yʿny ychh kth vnan. Setthah ḥryṣ chhi tim mali ghnymt ḥaṣl krns petth. Tohyi sintụ̄ chhukh yhi mʿāmlh, khdays sintụ̄ chhu tihund mʿāmlh kh, yim ge time yimav chhunh godd petthe ayman avnmut khdays, tamhi mokhh chhe krimaczh Allah tʿālyā hn tihnzh sare ʿmlh be kar yimn hund thvab timn kunhi qsmh ạkhrts mnz ḥaṣl spdinh. Yhi kth chhe Allah tʿālyā hs nishhi āsan yʿny tihnz h ʿmlh be kar krnhi. Tihnzi buzdly hnz ḥalt chhe yiczh kh.

Timn chhu gmanh kh dshmnn hnz lshkrh chhanh vaps gmcz h ḥalankh timav chhu panun mḥaṣrh th ghyrh tulmut, hrgah byyhi dvbarh dshmnn hnz lshkr vaps yin tim krn pnnhi khạṭr psnd kh gamn andr rvuzith āsn kran tihindụ̄ ḥalat byyan lvukn nishhi dryaft, ghạlb kus gvv th mghlvb kus gvv, panh spdhn nh jng kyn mshklatn shạml, hrgah baalfrẓ tohyhi sintụ̄ jngs shạml thi rvzn, tvthi krn nh dshmnn hund mqablh mgr kme blụ̄ havnh khạṭr.

Vaqʿī chhu ae mslmanv pyghmbri khda jngs andr thạbt qdmy khạṭr aakh ʿmdh nmvunah. Tvyhi andrh timn lvukn hndi khạṭr yim amyd chhi thavan khdays sintụ̄ mlaqat krnch, byyhi yim amyd chhi thavan ạkhrts andr bddi thvabch, byyhi khdae sund yad chhi kran setthah zyadh, timn lvukn pazi kh prth mʿāmls andr ḥrkt v skvns, nshst v brkhvasts andr hmt v astqlals andr pkn tim tihindy qdmh tihindy mtabʿth.

Baayman kạmilv vuchhhi dshmnn hnzh varyah lshkrh ḥmlh krith yivan, dapnhi lgụ̄ yohe chhu suh mvqʿ yymuyk vʿdh aashi thvvmut avs khdayn th tihindụ̄ pyghmbrn, pvz avs frmvvmut khdayn th tihindụ̄ pyghmbrn. Yhi mvqʿ pysh yinh sintụ̄ huryvv timn mgr tihund ayman th tihnzi frmanbrdạry hund jdhbh, yhi vṣf avs sarine baaymann andr mshtrk bʿẓ avṣaf ạsụ̄ bʿẓ baaymann andr mkhṣvṣ, timn mtʿlq chhu Allah tʿālyā frmavan.

Timve baaymanv andrh chhi bʿẓ tim yimv pvur kvr suh vʿdh janthary hund yus timav kvrmut avs khdays sintụ̄. Chnanchh timav ndrh kr bʿẓv pvur pnnụ̄ dhmh dạry yʿny shhyd spdụ̄ jng kran. Byyhi chhi timav andrh yim tamhi kis antẓars andr chhi kh krvathi aashi thi aamhi shhadt kh sʿādtuk mvqʿ. Timav kvr nh tvdyl pnnis mʿāhds andr aakh dhrh thi.

Yhi vaqʿh sapud yymhi kthhi mvkhh yuth Allah tʿālyā pziyạris pzich mvzvurụ̄ diyhi, byyhi yuth ʿdhab kri Allah tʿālyā yimn mnafqn, hrgah suh yyczihh, nath diyhi timn tvbh krnuk tvfyq. Pzipạtthụ̄ Allah tʿālyā chhu hmyshh setthah mghfrt krvun setthah rḥm krvun, tmụ̄ sund timn nishhi tvbh qbvl krun chhunh kynhh bʿīd th dvur.

Allah tʿālyā hn krụ̄ pnnhi qdrt sintụ̄ kạfr dfʿ mdynh shryf nishhi czkhhi hthe. Timn pyvv nh plhi kihinụ̄. Tim yymhi mqṣdh āmtụ̄ ạsụ̄ suh mqṣd sapdukh nh pvurh czkh shrpkh nh pnnyn kaddyn. Allah tʿālyā sapud kafy ath jngs andr baaymann, timn pyyhi nh jng krnch ẓrvrthe. Jng nh krne kvr Allah tʿālyā hn kạfrn hund shr dfʿ. Allah tʿālyā chhu hmyshh setthah qvt vvl setthah ghạlb, ts nishhi chhunh kạfrn aamhi ṭryqh shkst duyn kynhh ʿjyb th nv kthah.

Byyhi yimav ahli ktabv yʿny yhvudyv yimav bd ʿhdy krith kạfrn mdd duytmut avs, tim vạlụ̄ Allah tʿālyā hn byhi pnnyv qlayv andrh bon, yimn mnz tim mḥṣvr ạsụ̄, byyhi trvvun tihindyn diln andr skht rʿb th hạbt tohyhi mslmann hund. Chnanchh timav andr mạryvukh tohyhi bʿẓ lvukh th bʿẓ kryvukh grftar.

Byyhi kriv tvhụ̄ malk th vạrth Allah tʿālyā hn tihindyn zmynn hndụ̄ th tihndyn ghrn hndụ̄. Tihindyn maln hndụ̄ byyhi tamhi zmynkụ̄ ypạrụ̄ nh tvhụ̄ pkụ̄mtụ̄ thi ạsivzanhh yʿny zmyni khybr. Allah tʿālyā chhu hmyshh prth chyzs petth qdrt vvl.

Ae pyghmbri brḥq, tvhụ̄ frmạviv ḥẓ pnnyn znann, hrgh tvhụ̄ czhanddan chhav dnyahch zndgy byyhi tamhi zndgy hund sazv saman, tylhi pkiv, me nishhi yiyiv, bh kr tohyhi dnyahuk mal v mṭaʿ ʿṭa krith rokhṣt rthi ṭryqh. Ṭlaq dimav yuth yythi nas khosh kryv tthi nis gczihth kriv tvhụ̄ ḥạṣl dnyahuk sazv saman.

Nth he chhiv tvhụ̄ czhanddan khda th tihund rsvl yʿny yythụ̄ mvjvdh ḥalt se petth kriv tvhụ̄ qnaʿt byyhi kriv akhtyar ʿālmi ạkhrt yʿny jntuk thvd drjh, yus rsvl krym ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slm sndi ḥrmi mḥtrm āsnh mokhh tihindi khạṭr mqrr krnh āmut chhu yas yosh tohyhi andrh nykv kar āshi, tmụ̄ sndi khạṭr chhe Allah tʿālyā hn tyar thạvmcz bdd mvzvurụ̄, avt tanụ̄ avs nby krym ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slm sndi ṭrfh ḥkmi khda azvaji ṭahratn kun khṭab, aamhi pth chhu Allah tʿālyā frmavan timn azvaji ṭahratn.

Ae bddis pyghmbr sndyv bạczv th znanv, yosh aakhah tohyhi andrh kanhh be hvudh kạmah kri yʿny tiyuth mʿāmlah kri yymhi sintụ̄ nby krym ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slm dl tng th pryshan gczhn, ts yiyhi ạkhrts andr dognh ʿdhab krnh, thi chhu Allah tʿālyā hs āsan, ts hykhi nh tamhi nishhi kanhh chyz pth rttith.
Byyhi yosh aakhah tohyhi andrh frman brdary kri khdae snz byyhi tsndis pyghmbr snz, byyhi kri rcz ʿml, ts dimav asụ̄ mvzvurụ̄ thi dognh, byyhi chhu aashi tsndi khạṭr ʿztuk rvuzy tyar thvvmut.

Ae bddis pyghmbr snzv znanv, tvhụ̄ chhav nh ʿām znanv andrh kạnshi znanhi hishhi, blkh chhu tuhund mrtbh setthah thvd, hrgah tvhụ̄ prhyzgary kriv akhtyar. Ps gczhn nh tuhnz vopr mardn sintụ̄ nrm trayhi nzakt san kthh krnhi yylhi kth krnch ẓrvrt pyyhi, yuthnh suh shkhṣ ys dils mnz ychh khyaln hnz bymạrụ̄ āshi tohyhi nsbt ychh khyalch khvạhsh kri, byyhi ạsiv kth kran ʿām dstvr mṭabq, aisharv th knayav vrạe.
